titleStmt.title: Śāntisaṃgraha: 1) Vināyakaśānti 2) Navagrahayajña 3) Karmavipākoktam Niṣkādipurāṇam 4) Puruṣasūktavidhānam 5) Rudravidhānam 6) Nārīrajodarśanaprāyaścitta 7) Pañcagavyavidhi 8) Bhūvarāhamantra 9) Viṣucikācikitsāmantra

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a multitext manuscript. This is a collection of ritualistic texts. Fisrt 10 folio are missing.

ruv-144v 7 tri pañcasūlaṃ caturaśukantathā madhyenusārdhaṃ? hatabhuksamanvitaṃ bahirścatāraṃ. caritaśca śaṃkaraṃ śrirudrayantraṃ munayo vadanti . hariḥ oṃ .. śubhamastu śrigurubhyo

msItem.title: Nārirajodarśanaprāyaścitta
msItem.incipit: narirajas-149v 1 bṛaspatiṃ grāhamān naraṃgatā nāri tadiurdhvagatāpi vā dṛṣṭā yadi vā rajomohāt ??? surottamaḥ prāścittaṃ narirajas-149v 2 vinirdiṣṭaṃ āśuṣkam samācaret iti

msItem.title: pañcagavyavidhi

msItem.title: Bhuvarāhamantraṃ

vs-15r 1 vibavānusāreṇa bhurīdakṣiṇāmapi ṛtvigādibhyo tebhyo brāhmhaṇebhyām pratipādya brāhmhaṇān bhojayet … iti vināyakaśāntiḥ

nava-15v 1 atha navagrahayajñaṃ yājńavalkyaṃ śrīkāmaśśāntiḥ kamu vā grahayañjasamārabhet .

niksha-33v1 atha karmavipākoktaṃ nikṣādipramāṇaprakaraṇam . bā?lasūryamaricisthaṃ ??sare surīti svanaḥ.
niksha-40r 1 bhiṣete viniyogataḥ hariḥ oṃ . atha viṣṇusahasranāma vaiśaṃpāyana śṛtvā dharmānaśeṣe(ṇa) atha viṣṇusahasranāma vaiśaṃpāyana śṛtvā dharmānaśeṣe(ṇa) niksha-40r 2 pāvanāni ca sarvaśaḥ bhajanti ye puṣkārāṣkaṃ na te yānti parābhavaṃ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu .
